com.pump.image.gif.block

Class GifCommentExtension

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.pump.image.gif.block.GifBlock
      • com.pump.image.gif.block.GifExtensionBlock
        • com.pump.image.gif.block.GifCommentExtension
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    GifConstants

    public class GifCommentExtension
extends GifExtensionBlock
    This contains textual information which is not part of the actual graphics in the GIF Data Stream. It is suitable for including comments about the graphics, credits, descriptions or any other type of non-control and non-graphic data.

    • Field Summary

      • getBytes

        public byte[] getBytes()
        Description copied from class: GifBlock
        This outputs the exact byte representation of this block.

        A series of these byte arrays combined can create a GIF file.
